Title: The Pot
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Julieanne Smolinski, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace and Frankie continue to argue over the gun incident Grace, Brianna and Mallory smoke Frankie's pot before Grace and Frankie settle their fight.
